name: Doug Serrurier
introduction: Louis Douglas "Doug" Serrurier (9 December 1920 in Germiston  4 June 2006) was a racing driver and racing car constructor from South Africa.  He participated in 3 Formula One World Championship Grands Prix in the 1960s, only racing in the South African Grand Prix event, debuting on 29 December 1962.  He scored no championship points.
